text:
Hi,

Really sorry to have been so long before replying to your message.

It's really nice to meet you.

Please let me know if you have any specific questions and I'd be happy to answer them as best I can. 

Montreal is of course a great city to be in for VFX and there are lots of options. Definitely consider the size of company, and the type of work that you are interested in, because the experience can be completely different at different places. 

I'm currently delivering a project here for the next 6 weeks. I'll do my best to reply more frequently with any questions you have. 

Thanks
